solution_line_template: First subtract the {double_counted} toddlers Bill double-counted from his count: {bill_counted} toddlers - {double_counted} toddlers = <<{bill_counted}-{double_counted}={after_double_count}>>{after_double_count} toddlers
Then add the {missed} toddlers he missed to find the real count: {after_double_count} toddlers + {missed} toddlers = <<{after_double_count}+{missed}={real_count}>>{real_count} toddlers
